text: @CHIZMAGA @realDonaldTrump has hotels in Florida, New York and Chicago that could help alleviate capacity at hospitals overrun with patients. Has he offered any of them? No. Meanwhile @JBPritzker donated $5 million to help non-profits in Illinois. #leadership https://t.co/rZX4cr9esX

entity.name: In Chicago, Trump calls the city an embarrassment to the US
entity.description: Donald Trump has opened his first visit to Chicago as president by disparaging the city as "embarrassing to us as a nation"

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
